#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int palin(unsigned long long n)
{
	unsigned long long m = 0,x = n;	
	while ( n > 0 ) {
		m = m*10 + n%10;
		n = n/10;
	}
	if ( m == x) return 1;	
	return 0;
}

int main()	
{
	unsigned long long n,i,x;
	cin >> n;
	while ( n-- ) {
		cin >> x;
		for ( i = x;; i++ ) {
			if ( palin(i) == 1 ) {
				cout << i << endl;
				break;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
